item.text: Now the first covenant, in fact, had regulations for worship and its earthly sanctuary.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="4633" class="">tent</st> was <st data-num="2680" class="">prepared</st>, the <st data-num="4413" class="">outer</st> one,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> contained<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3087" class="">lampstand</st>, the <st data-num="5132" class="">table</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4286" class="">presentation</st> of the <st data-num="740" class="">loaves;</st> <st data-num="3748">this</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="40">Holy Place</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="2665" class="">curtain</st> there was a <st data-num="4633" class="">tent</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="40">holy</st> of <st data-num="40">holies</st>.

It <st data-num="2192" class="">contained</st> the <st data-num="5552" class="">golden</st> <st data-num="2369">altar of incense</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2787" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="4028" class="">covered</st> <st data-num="3840" class="">entirely</st> with <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st>. <st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> this <st data-num="3739" class="">ark</st><n id="1" /> were the <st data-num="5552" class="">golden</st> <st data-num="4713" class="">urn</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">containing</st> the <st data-num="3131" class="">manna</st>, <st data-num="2">Aaron’s</st> <st data-num="4464" class="">rod</st> that <st data-num="985" class="">budded</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the stone <st data-num="4109" class="">tablets</st> of the <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5231" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">ark</st><n id="1" /> were the <st data-num="5502" class="">cherubim</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2683" class="">overshadowing</st> the <st data-num="2435">mercy seat</st>. <st data-num="3568" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the time to <st data-num="3004" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3739">these things</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">detail</st>.

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> with <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="2680" class="">prepared</st> <st data-num="3779">like this</st>, the <st data-num="2409" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="1524">enter</st> <st data-num="1223 3956">continually</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">outer</st> <st data-num="4633" class="">tent</st><n id="1" /> as they <st data-num="2005" class="">perform</st> their <st data-num="2999" class="">duties</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> the <st data-num="749" class="">high priest</st> enters <st data-num="530" class="">once</st> a <st data-num="1763" class="">year</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="1208">inner</st> tent,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="4374" class="">offers</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for the <st data-num="51" class="">sins</st> of the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="51">committed in ignorance</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> is <st data-num="1213" class="">making clear</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> into the <st data-num="40">Holy Place</st> <st data-num="5319" class="">had</st> <st data-num="3380" class="">not yet</st> <st data-num="5319" class="">appeared</st> <st data-num="2089">as long as</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">old</st> <st data-num="4633" class="">tabernacle</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4714" class="">standing</st>.

<st data-num="3748">This</st> was a <st data-num="3850" class="">symbol</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> then <st data-num="1764" class="">present</st>, <st data-num="2596" class="">when</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">gifts</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifices</st> were <st data-num="4374" class="">offered</st> that <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5048" class="">perfect</st> the <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> of the <st data-num="3000" class="">worshiper</st>.
They served only for matters of food and drink and various ritual washings; they are external regulations imposed until the new order came.
But now Christ has come as the high priest of the good things to come. He passed through the greater and more perfect tent not made with hands, that is, not of this creation,

<st data-num="3761" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="2178">once for all</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="40">Most Holy Place</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="5131" class="">goats</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3448" class="">calves</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">his own</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>, and so he himself <st data-num="2147" class="">secured</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="3085" class="">redemption</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="5131" class="">goats</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5022" class="">bulls</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4700" class="">ashes</st> of a <st data-num="1151">young cow</st> <st data-num="4472" class="">sprinkled</st> on those who are <st data-num="2840" class="">defiled</st> <st data-num="37" class="">consecrated</st> them and <st data-num="4314" class="">provided</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">ritual</st> <st data-num="2514" class="">purity</st>,<n id="1" />
how much more will the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without blemish to God, purify our consciences from dead works to worship the living God.

And so he is the mediator of a new covenant, so that those who are called may receive the eternal inheritance he has promised, since he died to set them free from the violations committed under the first covenant.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> there is a <st data-num="1242" class="">will</st>, the <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> of the one who <st data-num="1303">made</st> it <st data-num="318" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="5342" class="">proven</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="1242" class="">will</st> <st data-num="949">takes effect</st> only <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="1893" class="">since</st> it carries <st data-num="3379">no</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">force</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">while</st> the one who <st data-num="1303" class="">made</st> it is <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st>.

<st data-num="3761" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> covenant was <st data-num="1457" class="">inaugurated</st> with <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> when <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> had <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">command</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, he <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="3448" class="">calves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5131" class="">goats</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2847" class="">scarlet</st> <st data-num="2053" class="">wool</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5301" class="">hyssop</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4472" class="">sprinkled</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">book</st> itself <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>,
and said, “This is the blood of the covenant that God has commanded you to keep.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">both</st> the <st data-num="4633" class="">tabernacle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4632" class="">utensils</st> of <st data-num="3009" class="">worship</st> he <st data-num="3668" class="">likewise</st> <st data-num="4472" class="">sprinkled</st> with <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Indeed</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="4975" class="">almost</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> was <st data-num="2511" class="">purified</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="129">blood</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> the <st data-num="130">shedding of blood</st> there <st data-num="1096" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="859" class="">forgiveness</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> it was <st data-num="318" class="">necessary</st> for the <st data-num="5262">sketches</st><n id="1" /> of the things <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> to be <st data-num="2511" class="">purified</st> with <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifices</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2032">heavenly things</st> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st> required<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2909" class="">better</st> <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifices</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="40">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="5499">made with hands</st>—the <st data-num="499" class="">representation</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="228">true</st> sanctuary<n id="2" />—<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="846" class="">itself</st>, and he <st data-num="1718" class="">appears</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> in <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">presence</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.

<st data-num="3761" class="">And</st> he did <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> enter <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="4374" class="">offer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="4178">again and again</st>, <st data-num="5618">the way</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st> the <st data-num="40">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="2596 1763">year after year</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> that is <st data-num="245">not his own</st>,

<st data-num="1893">for then</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> would have <st data-num="1163" class="">had</st> to <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="4178">again and again</st> <st data-num="575" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">foundation</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> he has <st data-num="5319" class="">appeared</st> <st data-num="530">once for all</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4930" class="">consummation</st> of the <st data-num="165" class="">ages</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="115">put away</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifice</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2596 3745">just as</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="606" class="">appointed</st> to <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="530" class="">once</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">then</st> to face <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>,<n id="2" />
so also, after Christ was offered once to bear the sins of many, to those who eagerly await him he will appear a second time, not to bear sin but to bring salvation.
